response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship that I believe could greatly enrich your collection or business. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. I trust that this offer will be considered carefully, as I am confident it represents an exceptional value for such a remarkable item. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this masterpiece with someone who appreciates its true worth.", "product_price": 750000}
